verses.kjv: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens.
verses.ct: I look up to you, the one who is enthroned in the heavens.

verses.kjv: Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God, until that he have mercy upon us.
verses.ct: Just as servants watch their master's hand for direction, and as a maid watches her mistress's hand, so we keep our eyes on the LORD our God, waiting for him to show us mercy.

verses.kjv: Have mercy upon us, O LORD, have mercy upon us: for we are exceedingly filled with contempt.
verses.ct: Show us mercy, LORD, show us mercy, because we have endured more than enough contempt.

verses.kjv: Our soul is exceedingly filled with the scorning of those that are at ease, and with the contempt of the proud.
verses.ct: Our soul has had more than enough of the mockery of those who live in comfort, and the contempt of the arrogant.
